main-pc.paragraph: Jintropin is successfully used by athletes all over the world. With the help of growth hormone, you can build muscle mass without rebound effect, burn fat, increase strength and endurance, and strengthen bones, ligaments, and immunity.

verification.heading: HOW TO PASS VERIFICATION?
verification.paragraph: It's easy to verify the authenticity of our product:
verification.point1: - Remove the foil strip from the protective sticker with a unique number and fiber optics;
verification.point2: - Enter the 12-digit code located under the strip into the special field on the official website.
